title: Medieval Dungeon Adventure #1
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Dark Dungeon Cell
rooms.description: A cold, damp cell deep beneath the castle. Stone walls glisten with moisture, and a single torch flickers on the wall casting dancing shadows. Iron chains hang from the walls, and straw covers the floor. A heavy wooden door with iron bands is the only exit.

items.name: pile of straw
items.description: A musty pile of old straw in the corner of the cell

items.name: rusty nail
items.description: A long rusty nail, possibly useful for picking locks

items.name: old wooden bucket
items.description: A weathered bucket with a false bottom

items.name: prisoner's note
items.description: A scrap of parchment with desperate scrawling
items.text: They imprisoned me in the year of the great battle - 1066, when William conquered England. The guard's desk holds the key to freedom. Remember: the dungeon master is Sir Blackwood, prisoners are held in the tower, and the treasure lies in the vault.

items.name: hanging iron chains
items.description: Heavy chains bolted to the wall, one appears loose

items.name: heavy cell door
items.description: A thick wooden door reinforced with iron bands. The lock looks old and rusty.

rooms.name: Castle Guard Room
rooms.description: A stone chamber with weapon racks lining the walls. Swords, shields, and spears are mounted on display. A large wooden table sits in the center with dice and ale mugs scattered across it. Torches burn in wall sconces. A massive iron gate leads to the courtyard beyond.

items.name: wooden weapon rack
items.description: A rack holding various medieval weapons

items.name: ceremonial sword
items.description: An ornate sword with jewels in the hilt, too decorative for actual combat

items.name: guard's table
items.description: A sturdy oak table covered with the remains of a card game

items.name: guard duty roster
items.description: A parchment listing guard assignments and schedules
items.text: Guard Duty Roster: Sir Blackwood commands the dungeon. All prisoners must be secured in the tower. The vault contains the castle's treasure and must be guarded at all times. - Captain of the Guard

items.name: guard captain's desk
items.description: A desk with three drawers, each marked with a different symbol

items.name: castle layout map
items.description: A detailed map of the castle grounds
items.text: Castle Map: The dungeon lies beneath the tower. The guard room connects to the main courtyard. The vault is accessible from the great hall. All exits lead through the courtyard gate.

items.name: heavy iron key
items.description: A large iron key with the castle crest engraved on it

items.name: decorative shield display
items.description: Several shields mounted on the wall, one has a hollow back

items.name: hidden scroll
items.description: A rolled parchment hidden behind a shield
items.text: Secret Orders: The courtyard gate is protected by three security questions. Only those who know the castle's secrets may pass. The answers lie within these walls.

items.name: iron courtyard gate
items.description: A massive iron gate with intricate metalwork. A brass panel beside it displays three questions that must be answered to unlock it.

password_questions.question: Who commands the dungeon?
password_questions.hint: Check the guard duty roster and prisoner's note

password_questions.question: Where are prisoners held?
password_questions.hint: The duty roster mentions where prisoners are secured

password_questions.question: Where is the treasure kept?
password_questions.hint: Look at the duty roster and castle map

rooms.name: Castle Courtyard
rooms.description: You emerge into the open air of the castle courtyard! Sunlight streams down from above, and you can see the blue sky for the first time in what feels like ages. The courtyard is empty, and the main gate to freedom stands open before you. Birds sing in the distance, and you can smell fresh grass and flowers.

items.name: castle main gate
items.description: The main gate stands open, leading to freedom and the world beyond

items.name: stone fountain
items.description: A beautiful fountain with clear water sparkling in the sunlight

items.name: small flower garden
items.description: Colorful flowers blooming in neat rows, a stark contrast to the dark dungeon

rooms.win_message: Freedom at last! You have escaped the medieval dungeon and made it to the castle courtyard. The open gate beckons, and you walk through into the sunlight, leaving your imprisonment behind. You are free! You win!
